name: MutantCore
description:
While this game went unfinished, it was due to some time constraints of the shortened school year and hybrid schedule.  MutantCore is a 2D Puzzle Platformer created by a team of 5 in Spring of 2021. The unique art style drove this game to it's initial game play design.  With only one programmer, the scope was a bit of a challenge, but they were still able to pull off a pretty looking environment with a fun skeleton to a physics-based game.  If they had the normal amount of class time with one another, this could have been a fun and polished final product.

Team:

Taylor L - Art

Tyler L - Art

Ben G - Programming

Lu A - Level Design

Aidan C - Design

How to Play:

WASD to Move and Jump
